messages.content: Shirley James works with Danielle Lopez.

Harold Perez works with Jesse Adams.
Jesse Adams is a colleague of Patrick Cooper.

Martha Reed is a colleague of Ryan Morgan.
Ryan Morgan works with Kelly Jordan.

queries.question: Are Shirley James and Timothy Stevens related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
